# init(_:frameAnalysisSpacing:)

**Initializer**

Creates an image-alignment tracking request to determine the warp matrix.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ revision: TrackHomographicImageRegistrationRequest.Revision? = nil, frameAnalysisSpacing: CMTime? = nil)
```
